REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1988 reute d f BC-INVESTITECH-<ITLD.O> 06-01 0054

TEXT.TITLE: INVESTITECH <ITLD.O> GETS MORTGAGE LOAN
TEXT.BODY: Investitech Ltd said it has closed on a 500,000 dlr long-term mortgage loan in connection with its previous purchase of a Mulberry, Fla., plant, replacing a short-term borrowing. The company said full production at the plant will start immediately. Reuter
